remarks.para: Additional information about the TngnWbsvConfiguration class TBD.
This method sets all configuration settings for the Tingen Web Service.

Some settings are initialized at runtime:
The Tingen Web Service build number
The Avatar environment the Tingen Web Service will interface with
The Tingen Web Service mode
The current date/time

In addition to the above, this method also sets the Tingen Web Service build number,
which is in YYMMDD format. This value must be updated whenever the Tingen Web Service
is deployed to the host machine.
